com.vmware.vcenter.vm.storage.policy

Interface Compliance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService, ComplianceTypes, Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ComplianceStub

    public interface Compliance
extends Service, ComplianceTypes, com.vmware.vapi.internal.bindings.CompletionStageService
    The Compliance interface provides methods that return the compliance status of virtual machine entities(virtual machine home directory and virtual disks) that specify storage policy requirements. This interface was added in vSphere API 6.7.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Compliance.CheckInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Compliance#check vAPI operation.
      static interface  Compliance.GetInvocation
      Invocable that represents the Compliance#get vAPI operation.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.vm.storage.policy.ComplianceTypes

        ComplianceTypes.CheckSpec, ComplianceTypes.Info, ComplianceTypes.Status, ComplianceTypes.VmComplianceInfo

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.vmware.vcenter.vm.storage.policy.ComplianceTypes

        _VAPI_SERVICE_ID

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Compliance.CheckInvocation check(java.lang.String vm)
      Returns the storage policy Compliance ComplianceTypes.Info of a virtual machine after explicitly re-computing compliance check.
      Compliance.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String vm)
      Returns the cached storage policy compliance information of a virtual machine.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        Compliance.GetInvocation get(java.lang.String vm)
        Returns the cached storage policy compliance information of a virtual machine. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Invocation Result:
        Virtual machine storage policy compliance Info ComplianceTypes.Info. If null, neither the virtual machine home directory nor any of it's virtual disks are associated with a storage policy.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - if the system reports an error while responding to the request.
        ServiceUnavailable - if the system is unable to communicate with a service to complete the request.
        Unauthenticated - if the user cannot be authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if the user does not have the required privileges.

        Parameters:
        vm - Virtual machine identifier. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: VirtualMachine.
        Returns:
        instance of Compliance.GetInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described get operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.

      • check

        Compliance.CheckInvocation check(java.lang.String vm)
        Returns the storage policy Compliance ComplianceTypes.Info of a virtual machine after explicitly re-computing compliance check. This method was added in vSphere API 6.7.

        Invocation Result:
        Virtual machine storage policy compliance Info class . If null, neither the virtual machine home directory nor any of it's virtual disks are associated with a storage policy.

        Operation Errors:
        Error - if the system reports an error while responding to the request.
        ServiceUnavailable - if the system is unable to communicate with a service necessary to complete the request.
        Unauthenticated - if the user cannot be authenticated.
        Unauthorized - if the user does not have the required privileges.

        Parameters:
        vm - Virtual machine identifier. The parameter must be an identifier for the resource type: VirtualMachine.
        Returns:
        instance of Compliance.CheckInvocation which upon invoke executes the above described check operation. The operation result or the operation error will be stored in the CompletionStageFuture that invoke returns.
